summary: The tragic love story between Guido, the owner of a marble quarry and Luisa, the humble daughter of one of his employees, ends up in her giving birth to a baby boy. Giulio's mother is ... See full summary »
cast: Yvonne Sanson|Amedeo Nazzari|Françoise Rosay|Folco Lulli|Enrica Dyrell|Teresa Franchini|Gualtiero Tumiati|Alberto Farnese|Aristide Baghetti|Enrico Glori|Olga Solbelli|Nino Marchesini|Rita Livesi|Giulio Tomasini|Enrico Olivieri|Rosalia Randazzo|Giorgio Consolini|Loris Gizzi|Sidney Gordon|Cesare Lancia|Felice Minotti
title: Los hijos de nadie
